name: PepePAD
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
#PepePad, the most powerful #PEPE in the crypto universe! Ultimate #Launchpad CrossChain (BSC/Arbitrum/Ethereum) for $Pepe and #MemeCoins! We've crafted an irresistible offer, merging a token, launchpad, and FARM - all centered around IDOs for meme tokens. Farm NOW to capitalize on the most popular and trending coins in the market!

There are 3 ways to earn from farming; the first is the native token $PEPE. The second way is Earning a percentage of the tokens released on the platform. Lastly, all promotional events such as launch airdrops, marketing campaigns and PEPE holder cultivation will benefit.

PepePAD is on a mission to restore the glory of memecoins. The $PEPE, which was launched stealthily without pre-sales, taxes, LP burning and with a waived contract, is a coin that is here to stay, designed for the people, forever. Fueled by the sheer power of memetics, $PEPE will be your guide to a better future.

description.sl:
#PepePad, the most powerful #PEPE in the crypto universe! Ultimate #Launchpad CrossChain (BSC/Arbitrum/Ethereum) for $Pepe and #MemeCoins! We've crafted an irresistible offer, merging a token, launchpad, and FARM - all centered around IDOs for meme tokens. Farm NOW to capitalize on the most popular and trending coins in the market!

There are 3 ways to earn from farming; the first is the native token $PEPE. The second way is Earning a percentage of the tokens released on the platform. Lastly, all promotional events such as launch airdrops, marketing campaigns and PEPE holder cultivation will benefit.

PepePAD is on a mission to restore the glory of memecoins. The $PEPE, which was launched stealthily without pre-sales, taxes, LP burning and with a waived contract, is a coin that is here to stay, designed for the people, forever. Fueled by the sheer power of memetics, $PEPE will be your guide to a better future.
